price: Kuma Muka ƙarfafa mulkinsa, kuma Muka bã shi hikima* da rarrabẽwar magana.
arabic: وَشَدَدۡنَا مُلۡكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَفَصۡلَ ٱلۡخِطَابِ
footnotes: * Hikima, ita ce Annabci, rarrabe magana, shĩ ne sanin hanyar yin sharĩ'a da rarrabe mai ƙãra daga wanda aka yi ƙãra, da neman shaidu daga mai ƙãra da neman rantsuwa ga mai musu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
